name: tirreno
description: Tirreno is a self-hosted operational analytics and reporting tool for maritime or logistics data. It aggregates metrics and events into dashboards to support monitoring and decision making.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Collect and consolidate operational data from multiple sources into unified dashboards

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Monitor key performance indicators and business metrics with real-time updates

features.title: Event Logging
features.description: Record and analyze operational events for troubleshooting and process improvement

features.title: Dashboard Creation
features.description: Build custom dashboards with charts, tables, and visualizations for different stakeholders

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Generate reports on operational performance, trends, and anomalies for decision support

features.title: Data Visualization
features.description: Present complex data through intuitive charts, graphs, and visual representations
